Text.Page:
Controlling the mines means nothing if we can't get shipments in and out of here.

The {@LinkCreature:4#1031#sooty sporewalkers} and the {@LinkCreature:4#1032#smoldering ghilliedhus} are mindless beasts, but that doesn't matter when it's your ore-wagon they're tearing apart.

Keep them away from the roads, would you?
With those beasts out of the way, maybe we can get supply trains in and out of here.
